thread.title: Kent Brissman
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België Beoordeeld door Kent Brissman

author: Kent Brissman
title: Kent Brissman
text:
All times we have used Euroflorist in Belgium and Sweden it has worked perfect. As we now live in Portugal it's important for us to be able to send flowers to friends at birthdays and other occations and be sure that it's delivered in time so thanks for that.
Kind regards
Kent Brissman
